message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. We can always negotiate later.
I think I can do better than that. Your turn to negotiate!
Too low for me, Bob. I'm hoping for a better deal.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Meet me in the middle?
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I'm taking a firmer stance.
That's still too low for me, Bob. I'm not budging yet.
I'm getting closer to your offer, Bob. Can we meet in the middle again?
I'm not budging, Alice. Take it or leave it.
That's an insult, Bob. I'm not going to accept such a low offer.
I'm running out of patience, Bob. I'm willing to give you a better deal, but this is my last offer.
